MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY6 postcode area of Glenrothes. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.30pm to allow safe removal of tree branches which are growing through the overhead lines in the Greenhead of Arnot area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.48am on the 3rd of December 2020.
